case.state: H-hang on! That's a demon!
Kaz Kaan. Neo Yokio's premier man of elegance. It's nice to meet you.
Kaz Kaan. Neo Yokio's most eligible bachelor and demon slayer. Pleased to meet you.
What? There can't be two number ones!
Imitation is the most sincere form of flattery... but this is flat-out plagiarism!
What's this? A demon? Some kind of demon... trick?
There may be many bachelors, but there is only one number one bachelor.
A gentleman of elegance isn't afraid of a bit of competition. In fact, I welcome it!
Yeah, look, I don't need a wing man.
Gotta remind myself there's no way I'd run into anyone I'm related to... except maybe very distantly.
Another demon hunter or...?
Is... is pink hair a fashion statement in other worlds?
Huh... I'm getting... kind of a weird vibe...
Can't shake this weird feeling, like there's something dangerous...
Whoa... just got a feeling like... nah, never mind. It couldn't be.
Of course. The Soviets.
I'm usually fashionably late to these things. Are we... waiting for more people still?
So, do we wait for more people or is this it?
Oh, guess I'm a bit early. Is this everyone?
Looks like we're going to have a bit of a crowd to~background.time~.
Honestly, I'd feel kind of weird if it was just three people playing.
Hmm hm hmmm...
Nothing like a full table to witness my victory!
It's gonna be lively with this many people. Guess that's what I'm here for.
The more the merrier, as they say. Think there's still room for my boys, Lexi and Gottlieb? Guess not.
Uh... so... ~player~... I take it you... like bugs?
Uh, I mean, I just got here so I'm struggling to understand what I did wrong.
Uh... yeah, hello to you too?
And after hearing that I'm already feeling a bout of melancholy coming on...
So we're just... ignoring the talking butterfly?
So we're just... ignoring the talking firefly?
I'll warn you all, this isn't my first time playing strip poker. I've been to my fair share of ragers out in the Hamptons.
Embarrassment is temporary, but seeing people in their underwear is forever.
Don't be intimidated by my status as Neo Yokio's number one bachelor. Or maybe be intimidated. You're free to make your own decisions.
Ah-hem!
Let's go with ~cards.text~ and see what that brings me.
Hmm, I guess I need to exchange ~cards.ifPlural(these|this one)~ to have a chance.
Let me exchange ~cards.text~, please.
Man, it's not like me to have a good turn. Maybe luck is a lady.
This isn't going to be much fun if the cards make it this easy for me.
Maybe I should have Charles get some champagne to celebrate my victory...
This place has some nice vibes. Eclectic, busy, kind of like home.
Normally a person would ask for luck to be a lady, but I think it'd be much better if luck was a gentleman.
I don't usually play card since I don't really trust my fortune, but it could turn out to be well worth the risk to play here.
I think you've all got a lesson in elegance coming to you in just a moment.
I could use a Caprese martini right about now. Kind of a shame not to be even a little buzzed while playing this game.
Not all luck goes sour, right? Sometimes things do work out... right? I am... seriously asking.
Okay... this seems good... but things aren't always as they seem.
Dangit, got to keep my head in the game. I didn't even realize what I had there...
So, my stock is high right now, right? I'm not misreading the room... or being tricked?
I'm feeling quite elegant to~background.time~ and it's all because of this lovely company.
Absolutely feeling this to~background.time~. Man, it was not a mistake hanging out with you guys.
Alright, when you see my cards just remember it's not a competition. Well, obviously this game is, but life isn't! Let's just be present here, you know?
No matter how this turns out, this was definitely a Kaz Kaan table. It's undeniable.
These are great cards, but somehow I don't feel very safe...
Focus Kaz. Remember your training... not that you've ever had any training.
So... weird vibes tonight... right?
Just play the game Kaz. Don't get distracted by strange thoughts.
Shining hope gives way to darkest despair. Luck is an illusion cast by a vengeful and wack god...
Why does lady luck taunt me with good fortune? She should cut me free, to fall into a pit of depravity and major embarrassment.
Whatever...
Why am I even trying? There's obviously a cosmic plot to keep me in a state of eternal wackness...
Wonder how this is gonna turn out...
Charles, could you-- oh, right. No Charles here.
It's not very elegant to try too hard to win...
Yes, more vibes please...
Neo Yokio does have places like this. Dens of ill repute, I mean. Not multi-dimensional nexuses... or is it nexi?
Is Neo Yokio the greatest city in the multiverse? You know, lately I've been wondering if it's even the greatest city on Earth...
Alright, alright, let's get on with this. I've got a field hockey match I don't want to be too late for.
Playing with cards makes me contemplate that nature of luck. The whims of numbers and nature. No inherent goodness or badness, just a cascade of dominoes in an unflinching universe.
I've a bit of a weakness for a pretty face. Don't think I don't know that might backfire in this sort of context.
C'mon, Kaz, focus up. Don't let them get your head all foggy...
Eh, this will be good enough. I'm kinda feeling myself right now anyways.
It's not going so bad, right? I can probably afford a slip up or two...
A small blessing. A piece of driftwood in an endless ocean. This is better than I deserve, honestly.
Drat. Well, this isn't so bad. I guess it's possible that maybe I still might lose this hand somehow.
It will be what it will be. Who am I to struggle against fate? Against the gods, if there be gods that set fate against a mortal like me.
Would it be so bad just to stop trying? To give up and consign myself to my cringe-worthy fate?
Why concern myself with luck? It's out of my hands. An unknowable fate is exciting.
Win or lose, we're all still having fun, right?
Even if I can't win, it was just nice to be able to chill with such an excellent crowd.
Can we keep the good times rolling? Even if just for a bit of extra time? Maybe we could work it out.
I can't focus with all these weird vibes?
Something is throwing off the chakra or the feng shui or something in here.
If you're trying to throw me off my game, let me just say it's not going to work as well as you think!
Is it hot? I feel like it's hot? Does that make sense? Does anything make sense?
Win, lose... we'll all be equal in the grave.
At least I don't have to worry about Arcangelo popping up and being a nuisance.
Maybe this is retribution for something I did in a past life...
I might need some good vibes to balance me out...
Aww, man! I'm such an herb! I need, like, a do-over!
I hope aunt Agatha isn't looking for me... or know where I am somehow.
This world is so cruel and unjust to me specifically!
A gentleman is always a good sport, even when what he's playing is clearly not a sport because it's all luck and no skill... which as I gentleman I have a lot of.
I see retail therapy in my very near future.
I could use some help from the boys right about now.
Oops. So much for not getting distracted...
Ugh. Base feelings cloud the mind to reason... or something.
I mean, even if I lose I'm still popular, right?
... I'm getting the feeling that... I might be getting taken for a ride...
Black clouds gather turning day into night. Turning sunshine into rain. The world is gray and so am I.
Oh, great, it's wackness all the way down.
Giving up won't make me feel better and seeing this through won't make me feel worse.
There's that familiar melancholy.
If I lose this one, then I lost it for you.
Usually a little mistake like this would send me spiraling into a deep blue funk.
Ah, shoot. This is so, I dunno, wack? Honestly, I'm feeling the vibe a bit too much right now to get bent out of shape about it.
Even a fall can be elegant.
Remember me for the man of elegance and fashion I was and not the muttering, sweaty mess I became...
W-what? Good cards? In this economy?
I appreciate your dedication to my misery, but at some point the courageousness has diminishing returns.
Uh... maybe we should take a break? Is it time for snacks?

Neo Yokio is, of course, the greatest city in the world {small}probably{!reset}. We've got the finest dining, the most elegant clothes, and a demon situation that is totally under control thanks to me.
Can we throw Don Patch in a garbage can or something?
Whoa, hey! Only accept the genuine article!
W-what? Don't throw it to me! I've got no idea what you're talking about!
I'm just... gonna ignore him...
She's obviously talking about you.
Ha, no! I don't really "study" magic. I'm just a natural!
Amazing. Now, is that any part of your body?
I guess I could stand to be a little bit taller. Not too tall, though. I want to have good stature without being totally gangly.
Ahem... uh... bit awkward now...
Oh, come on... that's hardly fair...
I only know what I've been told about it, but I haven't thought about it too much. Besides, the mystery is a big part of the vibe here.
I'm more of a lead vocalist than a member of the band. I'm just more natural out front.
I, uh, didn't mean any offense. In fact, it's probably better that you're not acting quite that old. Pretty much everyone else that age is consigned to oblivion.
I don't know if this counts, but there is Damien Hirst sculpture For the Love of God. It's a platinum cast skull with over 8,000 flawless diamonds embedded in it. That's pretty unusual, right?
I keep feeling like... something is happening? Sorry, that's vague. Maybe I'm just tired.
There's this weird feeling inside me like existence is fragile and everything is a lie and it is shockingly not melancholy.
Something is... weird right? Better not be demons. I'm not dealing with it...
When I need pampering, I have Charles draw me a hot bath and play me the latest hits. That's the ideal right there.
Sometimes I just like to sit in the park and have Charles shade me. It's a rather simple pleasure, but it does take away my worries for a while.
I guess I rely on Charles for all my pampering needs. It's pretty much at the point where he anticipates my needs before I even know about them...
Nothing makes me feel better about myself than when someone brings me a hot drink right after I wake up. Of course, by "someone" I mean Charles.
I'm still not convinced you're not trying to lull me into a false sense of security, but it's not like it's totally killing the vibe...
Hi. I feel like we got off on the wrong foot. My name is Kaz Kaan, gentleman of peerless elegance.
There's only one sure-fire get rich quick scheme, and that's to get born rich. It's fucked, but that's capitalism.
If you know anything about demons, I have an exorcism I'm supposed to perform on some heiress later. It'd be nice if someone else could do it so I can play bocce ball with my boys instead.
Does it really take that long to learn? Huh. I've just always sort of been able to do it. It didn't occur to me there might be books about it...
Heck, I'd invite Lexi and Gottlieb to play. It might be kinda weird for me, but they're both pretty open minded and they always make things fun.
Teasing is so grade school. Doesn't matter if you like the person or not, you're just being a herb.
Baths are usually private relaxation time, but I wouldn't be totally opposed to present company joining me for a little private time.
Pillow talk, definitely. I want my girl in my ear so God doesn't have to hear all the nasty things she wants done to her.
Yeah, I've had some real howlers in the sack before. There's nothing wrong with enthusiasm, but sometimes it's just too much.
Yeah, I usually keep it pretty light on the alcohol. I'm a total bummer as a drunk...
Could a parent pick a favorite child? How could I pick one outfit to favor above the rest? Fashion is always evolving, changing. An elegant gentleman needs to be ready to adapt and trend-set.
As a trend-setter, I can't get too stuck in my ways. Picking favorites might make me too complacent. I have to keep pushing the envelope, finding the next step in elegant couture.
I'm not sure your image could survive such a drastic branding change. Perhaps we embrace the inaccessibility of your name as a feature of the experience that is you.
Is not getting depressed a superpower?
I mean, I'm basically already a superpowered demon hunter. You can't improve on perfection, but I guess it would be nice if I was, like, strong enough to throw a bus or something.
I've got to thank god for Mecha-Butlers. Without Charles I might starve, or forget to fold my socks, or never get out of bed, or never go outside, or...
Does a cocktail shaker count as an amenity? I've got no idea how you'd make a proper caprese martini without one.
Lint rollers. I don't know how anyone wore black before we had lint rollers. It's just... it's crazy, right?

I think the entire waking world is held up by the invention of the coffee maker and by extension the cappuccino machine. Without those, it'd be much harder to pretend were aren't miserable to be awake.
Honestly it's just a relief to know you're not a demon...
So... I guess you're not a demon? I mean, even if you are you're awfully friendly for one...
That level of selflessness is... it's making me dangerously self-reflective...
... Is it morally correct to make someone so nice strip?
Excuse me?! 800?! I'm cool with older women and all... but 800?!
Really?! 800?! Damn! You could accumulate a whole army of exes in that time!
Well, what kind of offerings do you like? How about a big Toblerone?
Do fox spirits accept giant Toblerones as offerings?
Whatever I come up with could never be scarier than would my aunt would do to me if she found out I was here.
I try not to think about it. I'm scared my aunt will somehow know what kind of nightmares I have and use those to punish me...
If those are designer clothes ~classy~, I could check them real quick for demons. You're not floating and shooting lightning, so you're probably in the clear.
Take notes, ~player~. Unless you're planning on building a time machine to the 1600s, a wise bachelor is going to avoid wearing a cape.
Regardless of what you think of ~cape~'s outfit, it's best for a bachelor to avoid capes unless you're a devious oil baron. Side note: don't be a devious oil baron.
Image is very important for a bachelor, ~player~. I hope you own a hairbrush, unlike ~messy~...
See, ~messy~ illustrates a very important point for us bachelors, ~player~. If we don't take pride in our appearance and never comb our hair, we will be bachelors forever.
See how the hood obscures ~hooded~'s face, ~player~? Being a top bachelor means dressing in a way the accentuates one's features instead of obscuring them.
Okay, quick tip for the aspiring bachelor, ~player~. Hoods stay down so the world can see your face. People associate raised hoods with bank robbers, vandals, and eco-terrorists.
~Player~, a bachelor must always be ready to provide stimulating conversation. You don't want to be out on a date with someone like ~quiet~ and have there be zero conversation.
As an expert bachelor, I have assessed that your greatest weakness is your reluctance to speak. Even ~quiet~ is more outgoing with you. You don't have laryngitis, do you?
Tattoos are not elegant, but they're not inelegant either. A bachelor's body is his story, so it's up to you ultimately. It does mean you might miss out on a lot of modeling deals.
I've thought about getting a tattoo myself, but the bachelor board would not treat me kindly if I did. I'd have to get it somewhere not obvious, like my thigh. A portrait on my thigh?
Uh, a top bachelor should never be visibly armed. You want to be approachable, and non-threatening... you feel me, ~player~?

In Neo Yokio, the folks who oversee the bachelor board really frown on violence. I'd lose a lot of points if I walked around fully armed. A bachelor should be armed with just his charm; it might save his life...
When you're a notable, elegant, and eligible bachelor like me, you gotta make sure you're seen with all the big time celebrities in town. All publicity is good publicity.
A successful bachelor puts himself out there, ~player~. You might not be used to chilling with celebrities, but maybe you can practice by not embarrassing me in front of ~famous~.
While bachelordom is ultimately something you want to get rid of, ~player~, don't be too eager to get into a relationship. There are some real weirdos out there...
Being a ultra-famous bachelor does have its drawbacks. I've got some super crazy admirers out there. Since you're perfectly irrelevant, ~player~, you're probably safe from all that.

~Player~, I've got it on the best authority that masks are going to be the hot new thing very shortly. Cover those eyes up and get ahead of the trend. That will set you apart from the other bachelors.
Damn, ~masked~ must be tapped into the trends because masks are about to be hot. Better get in on this quick, ~player~, because all the top bachelors are already all over it.
~Player~! Let me bless you with this piece of advice: you and your boys need matching sweaters. All the top bachelors are coordinating their sweaters with their boys, and you should be too!
Ah, the sweater. Understated. Luxurious. Elegant. I wouldn't be a top bachelor if me and my boys weren't coordinating our sweaters. Matching sweaters, ~player~. The people eat that shit up.
A bachelor has a lot on his plate in any given day, so if you haven't already get a mecha butler. While he handles the minutiae of your life, you can focus on being as elegant as possible.
~Player~, you don't have a mecha butler, do you? If you're serious about being a top bachelor, you gotta have one. Without my butler, Charles, I'd waste so much time walking places and carrying shit.

state.text: All this taking off of clothes might actually be Helena Saint Tessero's kind of game. I wonder what she's up to nowadays?
Feeling kind of blue, for some reason. Times like these I start thinking about my ex, Cathy, again. That makes me even bluer...
Woo, it's getting a little steamy in here. I hope I'm not getting drawn in again. I don't want another Sailor Pellegrino incident...
Is it weird I wore Mila Malevich's jumpsuit? I guess that old man did too... oh fuck that's even weirder...

case.state: Neo Yokio is full of fast cars and freedom, but I fly most everywhere on my butler. How does everyone else get around?
Alright, lightning round creative thinking exercise: you're dunked in your supposedly dead uncle's infinity pool and you emerge as an animal. What animal are you?
They say competition inspires innovation, but it can also breed contempt. The same people we compete with are sometimes those we have the most in common with. Don't you think?
You ever feel like life is trying to take you down just so it can sadistically kick you while you're down because everything is wack?
Sometimes enjoying the finer things picks me up when I'm feeling melancholy. I dunno. What cheers you up?
Anyone else have trouble getting over their exes or an ex? I could maybe use some insight...
Even when two people have a real connection, sometimes they just don't get together. You know what I mean? Who, to you, is the one who got away?
Karl Lagerfeld once said "vanity is the healthiest thing in life." Have you remembered to be vain?
So, anybody got a celebrity crush? Someone famous they've dreamt about a romantic evening with? It's okay if the answer is me.
You see, I have my very own mecha butler, Charles. He is quite handy to have around, takes care of all the little things a gentleman doesn't have time for.
Ever met someone who didn't turn out to be who they said they were? Like, a total smokeshow who is interesting and kind, but turns out to be... a real bonehead?
So, what's popular in music these days? I picked up something of an aversion to pop stars, so I'm a bit out of the loop.
Your own preferences on animals aside, would you say you're more of a cat person person or a dog person person.
This certainly beats being out on some dumb demon hunting mission from my aunt. I'm sure Neo Yokio can go a few hours without me and not burn to the ground.
You don't have any demon problems around here, do you? Nobody has smuggled in possessed Moschino boots? Happens in Neo Yokio all the time.
Smack talk usually works better when you're actually doing well yourself.
That is... not a stereotype I'm familiar with.
Charles is equipped with state of the art statistical analysis software... that some would consider "cheating" in this context.
The suits I deal with are Armani and Chanel. Not that I expect you to appreciate that...
Believe me, Polly, you do not wanna make this about class.
Do... do you have any basis for saying that? I don't see why I couldn't.
Oh man! Aunt Agatha doesn't need to see, or hear, about any of this!
"Yet," huh? Promises, promises. The disparity of our positions makes me feel like you might be something of a selfish lover...
It wouldn't be very gentlemanly to ask for more, but if you're offering I certainly wouldn't turn you away...
I take it this means you have a plot for me to lie in?
Why, only the greatest city there is: Neo Yokio. City of elegance, hub of culture, height of fashion, and home to the rich and famous.
Since I doubt you're smoking MS cigarettes, I'm going to guess those pistols are Berettas.
It is kinda mind blowing to think about a cocktail party or designer brands on an alien planet. Outer space makes me think of eating freeze-dried ice cream and really horrible potatoes.
It's a bit wild to think about partying or shopping on an alien planet. I guess all those cheesy sci-fi movies prepared me for distant planets that are more... dusty and lawless.
That's a bit reductive. I'm Neo Yokio's most eligible bachelor. I exemplify all it means to be a high-class gentleman. I'm a taste-maker. A trend-setter. Kaz Kaan is a brand unto itself.
Why are you asking me? I didn't make the drink, I just promoted it.
A gentleman takes his losses on the cheek. Besides, it wouldn't do to be a poor sport with a lady about.
If you want to examine me, feel free. Kaz Kaan is an open book, happy to satisfy any curiosity you have about me.
Those aren't necessarily mutually exclusive, Y'shtola. I could probably show you what I mean if you'd admit you'd like me to.
You wound me, Y'shtola. Don't we have a rapport by now? Are we not kindred spirits?
What I have under my underwear has very little to do with my ranking on the bachelor board!
That's a weirdly specific question about an event you weren't around for. How do you know about all of that?
You can't be serious. I mean, you specifically can't be serious ever and especially not about this.
I don't need some dumb blonde guy pestering me about being homies everywhere I go, thank you very much.
Are you just saying random words and trying to pass it off as profound?
I don't know what you're expecting, but it sounds like you're going to be disappointed.
Why, no occasion could be more special than chancing to meet you here, Ms. Heris. Regrettably, I am woefully underdressed for such an auspicious meeting.
You've got a keen eye, Lady Estelle. The Kaan family is at the head of the magistocracy in Neo Yokio. Safe to say the city wouldn't be as great as if it weren't for my ancestors.
You flatter me, Ms. Cynthia, but this ensemble is my casual, everyday look. Emphasizing comfort without sacrificing style. Kaz Kaan doesn't go out in anything less.
I think expanding one's horizons is very healthy, Ms. Fujibayashi. I know what the women of Neo Yokio think of me, but some outside opinions could help me improve my branding.
Uh... as much as anyone else, I imagine? Good fun for a rainy day with the boys, if nothing else.
I understand completely, Ms. Miura. Discrimination on the basis of wealth is so gauche. One's money, or rather their family's money, doesn't make them a better or more worthy human...
Ms. Maye! I, uh, I mean, thanks for the offer, but we hardly know each other. I just feel like it wouldn't be appropriate...
That's... complicated. The magistocracy enjoys an elevated position, sure, but the other noble families have always held us in contempt. We have keep to proving ourselves, prove we're still useful.
Of course, Lady Macneary. My family rose through the ranks in Neo Yokio thanks to our ability to use magic. Nowadays there's less danger though, so we're more of a proper noble house now.
Of course, but the road to true elegance is different for everyone. Fashion must be true to oneself, honest and open. Being comfortable in your clothes always projects a sense of confidence.
Look, I'm not here to exorcise anyone. If you don't cause any trouble, I won't be forced to bust open a can of magical whoop-ass on you.
Yeah, it doesn't take a trained demon slayer to pick you out of a crowd. Can we just mutually agree not to cause a scene? It's a bit gauche to mix business and pleasure.
Don't try and start trouble with me, Chara. I'm not here to put down a... whatever you are. Besides, aunt Agatha wouldn't appreciate me doing charity work.
Miss Jura, men who know appearances are important are a dime a dozen. Men of true elegance are a rare breed, but among them Kaz Kaan reigns supreme.
It's not so strange for a man to try and look his best. Whether or not every man succeeds is a different story. I'll warn you: it wouldn't be fair to men everywhere to hold them to my high standards.
Uh, Marlboro? I don't smoke, so I don't know any cigarette brands. Unless you mean the guns, in which case I think they're Berettas.
My best pick-up line? I don't know, Princess. How can I be sure you're actually worth it?
Well, I consider myself a gentleman of elegance first and foremost, but I have been known to exorcise a demon or two. It's my duty to the public.
I'm good in that department, thanks. I've already got a beautiful headstone picked out in the Kaan family plot. It's peaceful. Sometimes I like to visit and lay down on it.
Death is not a parallel move. The key to dying well is living well, and the key to living well is surrounding yourself with the people and things you enjoy the most.
Ha, monotony? Never heard of her! Hardly any two days for me are the same for me. Things are usually pretty chill, but if I wait long enough something exciting is bound to happen.
I'm not one to turn down an experience like this. Good chance to meet some new people, the sort I'd never be able to meet with otherwise.
They can be. I never know when my aunt is going to call me for a job. I try to keep my schedule flexible so I can just chill with my boys, but when duty calls...
You're not wrong, even if I do feel a little like a fish out of water, but an elegant man of taste makes his way no matter where he finds himself.
Oh, you like it? Wow, uh, thanks! Usually people think it's weird. The upkeep isn't too much, but I do have to wax the strands every so often.

My aim is for the height of elegance. Understated luxury, a bold take on classical style, pioneering a new understanding of material and function, and above all being true to myself and my own vanity.
It's no problem, though I'm not always the best at explaining it. I specialize in detecting and destroying demons, so I, uh, mostly shoot lightning out of my hands.
Model? You? You're not... like... serious, right?
You? A fashion model? The thought hadn't crossed my mind, no.
Yeah, it's a bit nerve-wracking, but it almost looks like you're more nervous about it than I am!

The glamour of being a top bachelor is enviable for sure, but it's never my intention to stay in the game for long. Unfortunately, I don't have a lady to take me out of it, unless this is you offering?

The shining star of bachelordom lost its luster to me long ago. If I could, I would undo the tragedy that put me back in this position. For now I'm stuck like this, unless you're offering to help me out.
No, no, I am not "employed." I earn money by offering a service wherein I will exorcise demons. I don't have a salary or healthcare. I am performing a duty, a public service.
Before anything else, I am a gentleman of peerless elegance. As long as I follow those tenants, everything else falls into place. That's very simple stuff. I hardly know why you're asking.
If you can't even let the word "dick" pass through those sweet lips of yours, I'm not sure you're ready for me to pull it out. As a gentleman, I could never offend you...
A bachelor doesn't get highly ranked without a little controversy. If perfectly straight-laced guys were everyone's ideal type, you wouldn't be here either.
My family is only rich because we do all the demon slaying in Neo Yokio. As annoying as it is, we kind of have to handle it ourselves.
Well, I'm flattered you'd volunteer, but I get the feeling hooking up with you might be more trouble than it's worth.
If this is your way of volunteering, I might have to decline. You seem kinda... high-maintenance.
Usually I get hassled for the color instead of the style... not that this is a refreshing change of pace or anything.
It's not a a mop. I put a lot of time and effort into my hair, just as any gentlemen would.
It's not me that I'm looking at, it's my clothes. Gotta make sure the fit is immaculate. Also, I spend just the right amount of time looking. An elegant man can tell.
Well, it's especially obvious with me. I aspire to the highest echelon of elegance.
Huh, you think so? I do not sense in you a fellow melancholy soul. You seem... so different, but you think we're alike?
Nah, I come from a long line of demon slayers. We amassed a fortune performing exorcisms for the well to do of Neo Yokio way back when, and I continue that tradition today!
The Bachelor Board is fueled by public opinion in order to inform public opinion. It's all about who's trending and who's being seen. It's quite an honor to make the rankings and be recognized.
I'm always a gentleman of substance. I believe in love, but I also believe in fun. I try not to over think it in the moment. I just let it play out how it will.
I've already got a work-out schedule that I follow, same one my whole field hockey team follows. It's really important I keep up with my conditioning, especially mid-season.
Well, if you hate them so much I hope I don't remind you of them too much...
Well, back home everyone knows I'm Neo Yokio's number one bachelor. I don't have to approach women, they approach me. Sometimes in groups.
Usually my strategy is just to show up? Being Neo Yokio's number one bachelor means I get recognized wherever I go. I'm never playing offense, just defense... outnumbered.
I'm not one to turn down a chance to see what else might be out there, and this is about as out there as anyone could hope to manage.
It's my day job! It is boring! It is literally the last thing I'd rather be doing at any given moment.
The Kaan family is descended from the very first mages employed in Neo Yokio: the rat-catchers. Our family has protected the city from demonic threats for over a century.
Not just "a top bachelor," I am the top bachelor. You're looking at Neo Yokio's ichiban.
That's not why I'm here specifically, if that's what you're asking. I'm down to see how it all goes and just let what happens happen.
I know you're just angling for a way to make fun of me again. I'm not gonna fall for it.
That's one of the more distressing compliments I've ever received. At least... I think it was a compliment?
I'm pretty sure I should not answer that...
I'm not falling for that, Maria. I'm not giving you the satisfaction.
A gentleman always minds his appearance. You can't exude elegance if you don't dress the part
I dunno if "armor" is the right term, but you've got the basic idea. It's more like a suit that Sadie pilots rather than wears...
My aunt would kill me if I went to a job late. I just go in whatever I'm wearing at the time. It's just easier that way.
It is a little subjective, but the pull of public opinion can be easily measured and weighed. We bachelors live and die by how everyone sees us.
She grew apart from me. She wanted something more somewhere else, so she went out to find it. I was Neo Yokio's favorite son, and I was bound to the city. I could not follow her.
I'm not sure it would be tenable to date someone I met here. I mean, there's long distance and then there's long distance, if you get what I'm saying.

Well, a Toblerone is certainly fit to satisfy even the most discerning sweet tooth. It's only the finest Swiss chocolate you can get. I try and keep one on hand in case I need to reward a worthy deed.
If chocolate is what you crave, you can't go wrong with a Toblerone. I didn't really bring it to share, but in case I needed to bestow it upon someone who is worthy.
Well, a gentleman doesn't kiss and tell, but I do well enough for myself. Sometimes it's a curse being so famous; it's almost too easy!
Believe me, I would love to, but my aunt would never let me. Beyond that, I know a lot of these people semi-personally, so it would be sort of awkward if I just let them be possessed.
All it would take is for me to stop being a bachelor. If I were seen around the city with someone special on my arm, I'd disappear from the rankings right then and there.
I like to think I could keep things on the down-low, but I'm kind of always under a microscope socially. I don't think I could date a girl who had to be discreet.
The bedsheets? That sounds like more than just a "little interested."
None of these are words I'd associate with my brand. I am a perfectly elegant gentleman and Neo Yokio's number one bachelor.
I just want what everyone else wants. Someone sexy who understands what elegance truly is and lives to enjoy the pleasures of Neo Yokio.
Man, I wouldn't say I haven't got a care in the world. I worry about a lot of things. Sometimes I'm not even sure what I'm worried about...
Uh, yeah? I mean... what else even is there?
No, I wouldn't say bored. It's just... a lot of the women I've had the most admiration for end up leaving Neo Yokio one way or another. It's just made me curious about what else is out there.
Whoa, what gives? You look more nervous about this than I feel!
Well, your enthusiasm does kill the sting of loss somewhat.
Now my vibes are all messed up...
Am I being punked? You can't possibly expect me to believe I'd lose like this again...
Am I missing something here? You know, it's not so easy to pull the cashmere over my eyes...
There is for sure a bout of melancholy at the end of all of this...
There's just no way! Don't I deserve, like, a do over at this point?
Of course. Why not me again?
C'mon, Kaz, that was just bad luck. Don't psych yourself out...
That's horrible! Does it really have to be me again?
Looks like it's time for me to get down to it. I guess this is where the fun begins.
It wouldn't be a good look if I didn't lose at all! Gotta give the people what they want!
Yes, well, I figured I shouldn't just win outright. Best to make it an even spread, for appearance's sake.
Looks like it's the number one loss for the number one bachelor! Ha... ha? Ah, that was... funnier in my head.
Who could play the perfect game anyway? Certainly not me, the elegantly flawed and relatable Kaz Kaan.
It's not very good optics to just have a clean sweep anyway. I should thank you all for the privilege of having one loss under my belt.
Losing is all part of the fun. It's hardly exciting if I just stand here in my clothes the whole time.
Looks like you got me this time. Still, I'm doing better than I thought. Do you guys not get out much?
Looking around, I am a bit overdressed for this occasion. I could do with a dressing down.
Haven't had enough of Kaz Kaan yet? I guess I can understand.
A gentleman always keeps his chin up, even when things don't exactly go his way.
Fine, fine, you got me. It'll take a bit more than that to unseat the Ichiban!
If you're spoiling to see me a bit more undressed, I'm not beyond obliging you... even if I'm just doing this because the game dictates it.
Well, I could still win this, right? I'm looking a bit better than the rest of you, and I don't just mean in regards to my elegant sense of style.
This is getting kind of dicey. It's not going to come right down to the wire, is it?
Came this close to pulling it off too. That's a bummer...
I'd like to remind you all that I'm still very much in the lead here...
A gentleman would try to win without having to reveal anything too embarrassing...
I can deal with another loss. It wouldn't look good if I played strip poker and only took off my shoes.
I'm pretty sure if I only lost once you'd all be pretty upset with me, but maybe we can call it good after this one, alright?
It's not over yet. Maybe I could turn this around if I gave it a gentleman's try.
Okay, I could stand to be doing a little better. I thought I was being careful.
C'est la vie...
Why is the sting of defeat so much more poignant than the sweet honey of victory?
Guess it's too late for me to catch a break now...
I saw this going a lot better. Don't know why. Obviously my fate is to have fate stomp all over my hopes.
Yeah... just like Freddie Miles's party.
Well, at least nobody is recording on their phone like the last time I was naked in public...
Ah, fuck. Guess it's not a party foul this time though...
Can I just have a moment to say being overdressed for this is extremely gauche?
Seriously? This is killing my vibes...
Oh well, there we go. I could've handled that better.
I feel like I'm being a perfectly good sport here and not getting any recognition for it.
My fit is too expensive and my look too clean to just be taking it off so quickly.
I need to visualize my own victory a lot harder...
Already, a pattern that spells doom has begun to write itself upon the wall for me.
If I'm going to lose, it's going to be elegant as fuck.
Oh, come on! It's one thing to lose, but another entirely to be losing!
If they hear about this back home, I'm going to plummet off the Bachelor Board...
Math was never my strong suit, but what are the chances I suck this bad?
A deep dark mire of wackness, and I only sink deeper and deeper...
Ah ha, don't get too cocky. I might be taking my licks with composure now, but you keep talking like that and I'll give you a licking like you won't be so composed for...
Oh, nuh-uh. You'll have to wait your turn. Anticipation makes it all the more sweet.
Eh, well, for what I was picturing you can leave the hat on.
By all means. You'll be rolling in my grave, I promise.
Hey, now. I think the prize is a bit more substantial than you're letting on!
Can't exactly be on the bachelor board if I'm not a bachelor, now can I?
It was invented by my friends, and I trust them. Lexy and Gottlieb don't have a dishonest bone between the two of them.
Life is a swirling maelstrom of disappointment and betrayal. In this sweet oasis, I must drink deep of simple joys and raise the ship of my heart on the tides of companionship.
Here, let me get this shirt off so you can get a closer look. I'd never stand in the way of the pursuit of higher knowledge, Miss Rhul.

I must confess to being quite charmed by you, Y'shtola. This is certainly no arena for subtlety, and I would be terribly distraught if I missed my chance to make my impression on you. I'm just being true to myself, and by extension true to us.
Why rush into getting to know each other? There's plenty of time for that over dinner or while flying over the city at night.
You know, I'm starting to like you a little less...
Is that so?
I don't think we have enough time to cover all of that.

What is it to be homies? What is this fleeting, ephemeral sense of homieness one might feel for or think of another person? Are we really anything more than just two people passing briefly in this chaotic and uncaring swirl we call life?
And now you're just saying completely random stuff to throw me off... it's kind of creepy. Would you knock it off?
I can't believe I have to say this, but don't freak out. Also, my name still isn't Ralph.
Right. Real funny, Y'shtola. You can't actually be serious about that... can you?

Your friends just need to find their own brand. Find what feels right to them. Of course, one must keep in mind the appropriateness of seasonal attire. And they should avoid denim, and corduroy is right out. A good place to start is to pick out a sensible blazer, fitted if they can help it. Good clean lines are timeless, always a classic. Of course, formal drapery is always a daring look for an elegant man...
My outfit is certainly what I'd call everyday wear. Do you like it, Miss Heris?
I mean, in issues that really matter everyone gets a vote. Neo Yokio is still a democracy, whether you're rich or poor.
We're not "royal," but we are magical. That's how we got where we are in society. Unless you've got a mage in your ancestry, you've got no chance at using magic.

I guess I don't want to come across as elitist. Behind the money and family legacy, I'm just a regular guy. Well, a magical regular guy. At any rate, I just want to be elegant without being snobby or bragging. Kaz Kaan's branding is inclusive, not exclusive.
Sounds like you're more interested in my family's money than you are in me.

But my attire is what I do. I am a man of elegant taste. I seek the height of fashion. My personal brand is ever evolving and requires my constant attention. And not just close. I sample the finest of fine society.

I wouldn't say I'm important. I mean, sure, I'm Neo Yokio's number one bachelor, one of it's most prolific influencers, and the best demon hunter around, but that doesn't make me "important." At least, that's what I think.
Ah, nothing too special. Mostly I just shoot lightning from my hands and exorcise demons. I can {small}usually{!reset} tell when someone or something is a demon with it as well.
Damn, you're right, your highness. There's a lot I could learn from an impressive woman like yourself. Maybe we can have a chat later about it. I'll buy the cocktails if you'd do me the honor.
I had hoped to avoid work, but it's not like I'd just sit on my hands during an emergency. Besides, it'd be nice to take a job from a beauty like you for a change.
It's nothing extravagant. I wanted my resting place to be austere. Just a stone headstone from the family quarry and a stone slab covering the grave itself. My grave is, of course, already dug.
Personally, it wouldn't bother me at all. I'm sure other people would talk, but they'll talk no matter what. The only real question is what will they say.
I wouldn't be much of a gentleman if I allowed you to do that without returning the favor.
Ahem... well, there is a bit of a luxury in being an unknown, I'll admit.
The whole family is depending on me to do my job and maintain our reputation in Neo Yokio. It can be a drag, but a gentleman knows that the most important part of a burden is that you carry it.
Neo Yokio is the same way, but even there my hair stands out a lot. It's nice to get a compliment on it though, especially someone with such beautiful hair of their own.

Kinda glowy and wispy, usually. They don't always talk, but when they do they're always complaining about humans being too materialistic; although, they only ever possess stuff like diamonds and designer suits, so it comes off as hypocritical...

The purpose of a fashion model is to sell clothes. A model is merely a vessel, an avatar, a wall upon which a masterpiece is hung. Of course you don't want to hang art on an ugly wall, but the wall should also have a, well, more modest bust.

Look, it's not a slight against you, I promise, but anyone serious about showing off their clothing wouldn't pick you as their model. Modeling should be about showing off the lines, the material, the branding, and not about the, uh, huge breasts they're trying to contain...
Well, then you'll definitely like me. There's not another bachelor in Neo Yokio with half my sense of refinement and elegance.
Well, I've got nothing to hide, Fluttershy. If you see something you like, by all means take a look. No need to be embarrassed.
Oh, there's notoriety alright. If I screw up on a job, it's all anyone is talking about for weeks, but when everything goes just right I hardly get so much as a "thank you."
You think we're similar? Yeah, no, I don't see it at all. We're as different as an East Side Gentleman and a West Side Gentleman. What could we possibly have in common?
I've heard that before. Sometimes it's hard being this authentic.
Of course, but not you, right? You're, like... what? God's gift to freaks? Queen of the freaks? ~Player~'s caretaker?
And you're exempt from all that? Right, right, cause you're... what? A shining beacon to the weirdos? The pure light to contrast ~player~'s deep darkness?
I think I'll hang onto my earthly possessions. Things are important. Without my things, who am I? No, better to be a bachelor of means. Lets me get nice gifts for any potential dates.
I couldn't part with my things. My things are too important. They define who I am, fill my life with more purpose. Also, it helps dates go smoother if I can provide an elegant gift or two.
That's probably for the best. I don't see myself being able to take you out into public or anywhere nice. Probably not a good fit overall.
Elegance requires vigilance. There's no time to relax when you're at the top of your game. It's serious business and my business is my brand and my brand is me. I take myself very seriously.
Okay, well... that's pretty valid. Those are two things that are pretty exclusive to the pair of us. I'm sure if you were on the bachelor board, we'd be bitter rivals...

Business model? Uh, people tell my aunt they have a demon and I get rid of them. Demons in Neo Yokio always inhabit designer clothes or fine art. To the owners, money is no object when it comes to restoring or protecting their property. The city also keeps us on retainer, so the family gets a stipend to simply continue offering our services.
Oh? Okay, okay. I can vibe with this assertive side too. A woman who knows what she wants is hella sexy.
Hmph, vanity is one of the healthiest things there is.
Yeah, there's no way. I run enough risk of getting messed up hunting demons. There's your full-contact sport.

It's not the only way to get wealthy. Those of us who did make our fortune from exterminating demons are called Magistocrats. We keep the city safe from demons, so it's only natural we'd get paid, right? I mean, we're sort of a big deal.
Well, as a gentleman of elegance, I do hope the sterling quality of my company will speak for itself as we get to know one another.
Well, what about you? Where are you at to~background.time~? If you tell me, maybe I could meet you there, so to speak.
If you survive the initial media blitz and paparazzi documenting your new relationship for a whole news cycle, oh yeah. Huge weight off your shoulders.
Actually, I didn't really choose pink. It's just how I am; I was born pink.

Well, anyone who acknowledges the importance of personal appearance can't be that much of a fool. I think I can find it in my heart to forgive you this time if we can keep the mop comparisons to a minimum.

I wouldn't call it bravery since I'm not really afraid of demons. Normal people are terrified of them because they're powerless against them. I've had some rough times, but I always come out the other side okay.
You might struggle to find "normal" here, but let's not worry about that right now. Let's circle back to the part where you think I'm "good-looking."
Hey, that's pretty much how I feel about it. To be perfectly honest, I'd rather not have to work at all, but I did that we'd go completely broke. Obviously, that would be bad.
Well, it takes a lot of effort to be a gentleman of peerless elegance. I don't do it for the fame though, it's just a result of how I've chosen to live my life.
I get what you're saying, but I don't have the sort of mental energy it takes to be like that all the time. I don't need to be taken that seriously all the time myself.
Oh... well, I do put a lot of thought into my appearance. A gentleman of elegance wouldn't stand for anything less.
And I'm guessing by "we" you mean "you."
Look, Maria, there's no denying you're attractive. Even if you're absolutely terrifying, surely you gotta know you've got a killer body and a beautiful face.

If it's honesty you want, then I'm honestly terrified of you. I think you want a very specific thing and it's... admirable that you go after it so fiercely. It's rare that anyone has that much confidence.
Knowing you, you'd probably tell me I have a small penis no matter how big it was...
It's actually a walk-in closet, but you're absolutely right. You can't be a man for every season, without clothes for every season. I'm sure you've got an array of different looks too.
Sadie is Charles, or rather Charles is Sadie. Sadie drives the suit that is Charles, speaks for Charles, and so on and so forth. Apparently this is standard for mecha butlers.
I don't really have equipment and the only protection I carry around is in my wallet, Roll.
That's... uh... complicated? I'm not just gonna date the first girl who asks me during the next big gala. Just because I'm famous doesn't mean I don't get to be a little picky.
Part of me is still mourning the loss of that relationship. Her leaving was the start of a long journey, and it's only been fairly recently that I've finally found the path to move on.
You're the one who lives with a dude called "Mega Man." If you're looking for someone who could compete with that, maybe I should throw my hat in the ring.

As Neo Yokio's number one most eligible bachelor and preeminent authority on elegance, my sense for fashion is a cut above other men. That's not to say other aristocrats and celebrities aren't well-dressed. Most any man who comes from money takes the time to make sure he looks the part.

While it's true that not everyone is like me because there can only be on top bachelor in Neo Yokio, most anyone who has money is concerned with fashion to some degree. The thing about high society is that it's not enough to have money; you have to look the part or risk becoming yesterday's news.

You're not wrong, but from our perspective there's no need to arrange that sort of thing. The magistocracy's position is secured through its own legacy. There's no upward mobility even through marriage.

Neo Yokio is pretty much crawling with paparazzi, so we could pretty much go anywhere. Lattes at the station, a stroll through central park, and we grab lunch while we take the ferry. I guarantee my name is off the board before we even reach Staten Island.
If the tabloids find out about it, it won't be because I told them. I'd rather keep that just between the two of us.
My aunt hardly cares if I'm alone or with my boys or in the bathtub. She'll call me up whenever she wants to order me around.
Even as just a test, that's a risky move. It takes a lot of elegance to climb to the top of the social ladder, but even one little faux pas will knock you right off.
That might not be the best idea. Who knows what kind of repercussion that might have on my reputation. Bad news travels fast in the circles I run in.
Oh, is that so? Well, is there anything I should be doing to upgrade from "likely" to "definite?"
Seems kind of narrow-minded for them to outright reject me just for being a guy.
But why should that matter? In this day in age, one's status is separate from one's gender.
Hey, yeah! You know, a coincidence of this magnitude does call for a big Toblerone!
Wow! That's a good point! You really do deserve this big Toblerone!
Well... what the heck? No one's ever seemed to wanted one so bad from me! Here, you deserve this big Toblerone!
Wow, it's not everyday I meet someone else with such enthusiasm for luxury chocolate! Okay, you can have this big Toblerone! I know you'll be able to appreciate it!
Measure up? You're talking about Neo Yokio's number one bachelor. You don't get to where I am by failing to measure up...
It's nice to see some new faces around here. Most gatherings in Neo Yokio I attend are just the same socialites each time.
You know, usually I end up in these sort of games with people I know, like the other social elites of Neo Yokio and beyond. Same old same old each time.
This is a weird way to meet new people, but it is pretty exciting. Usually this type of thing happens at parties full of people I already know, celebrities, and celebrities I already know.
I'm always up to make some new acquaintances. Network with some extra-dimensional hotties and homies. Sometimes the scene back home can get slightly stale.
This is a Lemaire blazer. I can't just crumple it up and throw it on the floor. Clothing this refined requires care and caution.
Okay, I know what you're all thinking... Yes, this is a Lemaire blazer. I'm not just going to drop it on the floor and I'd like to keep it where I can see it.
I don't mean to be rude, but just keep in mind that this is a Lemaire blazer. I'm not going to just toss it on the ground where someone could come along and take it, or worse: step on the seams!
So obviously my Lemaire blazer is going to be returned to me at the end of this game, and free of wrinkles too. That goes without saying, right?
A gentleman must have a sport, mine is field hockey. I'd say it keeps me in pretty reasonable shape.
As a man of elegance and bachelor, I spend a lot of my time playing field hockey with my team: The West Side Gentlemen. Keeps my mind sharp and my body in shape.
You might be wondering how Neo Yokio's most eligible bachelor stays in shape. The answer: field hockey.
You'll note the fantastic shape I'm in. Of course, the captain of the West Side Gentlemen's field hockey team has to keep himself in prime physical condition.
I wouldn't be surprised if this all was some kind of ploy by my aunt to get me to work. None of you are demons in disguise, are you?
This isn't, like, some kind of set-up by my aunt, right? There are no demons around here? I don't mean to be rude, but I am a little suspicious.
Okay, I'm just gonna say it. This whole place is weird. Like, possible demon activity weird. I don't think you guys are possessed, at least in my professional opinion...
You guys would tell me if you were, like, possessed by a demon, right? I'm certainly not here to work.
Wait, what underwear am I wearing today? It's not something inelegant, I hope.
H-hold on a second. What underwear did I put on today? Oh man... please don't be... please!
Am I wearing... uh, quick question! You guys wouldn't judge me if my underwear had little... uh... you know what, never mind...
Uh, I'm not opposed to being seen in my underwear, but I would object to being seen in specific pairs of underwear...
Well, I guess this is goodbye, Ralph Lauren. You have served me admirably.
Ralph, you were my only ally in this fight. I can only hope your sacrifice won't be in vain.
I can't believe Ralph failed me. Maybe I should pray to Coco Chanel...
Sorry, Ralph. It's not you who failed me, but I who has failed you...
I don't need to see anything else. Say the word and it's yours, and I guarantee you'll show me what I want...
That's not a bad idea. From one exorcist to another, I think we would benefit from getting hands on with each other's "methods."
It's my desire to drop any pretense and have you decide if we're gonna hook up right now or if I'm going to have to caress that sexy little body of yours inside and out until you change your mind.
Hey, I'm a fan of fun. Even more if it's with you...
Being on the bachelor board is a great honor, but I'd much rather "take a lover" than keep my place on the board.
I think I'd rather try and explain how to make a Caprese martini than dive into whatever this dumpster fire of trust issues you've got going on is.
Knowing I'm in your thoughts will definitely keep my spirits up.
We could study magic, or we could study a little anatomy. Either way, we could have a lot of fun.
Well, if you're gonna make me choose...
Would it kill you to at least pretend you're impressed?
Of all the times to humor me, you choose now.
Right, and what exactly does any of that have to do with anything? Seriously!
Well, one thing you have going for you is that self-confidence, even if it's a delusional sort.

state.text: Chocolate doesn't cure the wackness of the world, but it eases the pain momentarily.

case.state: And he's back. I guess the upshot is I'm so confused I keep forgetting I'm almost naked.
I don't know what to tell you. This is how all my boys do it. The modern gentleman is manscaped! We're not cavemen...
That is both an insult to me and the proud tradition of the Bachelor Board...
Well, not every mage is rich and famous. I've got a cousin who basically just races ATVs and lives in a pool house.
Oh man, I could sum that up in one word: comfort! Sometimes you gotta suffer for fashion, but I suffer well enough on my own most days.
Thank you, Fluttershy, but believe me when I say that the thrill is double for me.
Trust me; you never have to compromise with anything when it comes to me... wait, did you call me a dandy?
Thanks, but I'll pass. Death is the final mystery whose coming solution gives each new day a sense of importance. Besides, I want to stick around for as many new winter lines as I can.
No offense, but I did peg you as the mischievous sort. Well, it wouldn't be the first time I was interested in a girl with... let's say "exciting" rumors around her.
Consider this an open invitation to try.
From the way you've been talking, I get the feeling you might be the thing to follow me home.
If they are, they sure have a weird way of showing it...
I serve at your pleasure, your majesty.
Hey, you're welcome! If you see anything else you like about me, feel free to say something.
Somebody has to do it. It's a drag because demons always attack during the best events of the year. Instead of partying with my boys, I have to work security.
Yeah, so modeling for clothes is right out, but we put you on the hood of a car or on a boat and someone's bound to make a mint. Nothing like the promise of breasts to sell vehicles to the desperate.
So clothing is a no go, but let's talk modeling for lifestyle. Ski resorts, spa retreats, five-star restaurants. We put you there, play up the cleavage, and that's money.
Damn, you're even cute when you're asserting yourself. Guess I shoulda figured.
Normal, huh? That sounds horrible.
Kaz Kaan doesn't do normal. Kaz Kaan only does extraordinary.
W-what?! Terminally?! No way! I'm just, y'know, in between relationships right now! I've got a lot going on! I'm just enjoying the stag life! Focusing on me! And my boys! And... and... cocktails!
W-well, I mean... sorry? I just sorta forgot you might have feelings for a second...
A gentleman is bound by duty to hear a lady's desires. I'm sure we could come to some mutually beneficial arrangement...
What? You mean, like, things? Houses and race cars and designer bags? Of course there's that too!
Oh, I'm not forgetting about stuff, don't you worry. Yachts and private villas and designer jewelry. All important stuff.
Well, I'm glad somebody gets it. Some people out there really don't understand at all, so we've gotta stick together.
Uh, I think I'm good. I'd kinda prefer not to have my legs broken...
Wouldn't that be, like, wrestling? I think I should stick to activities where I won't snap my neck, thanks...
Hey, now, I take offense to that. It is not "old junk." They are high-end, luxury commodities. As far as stuff goes, it's the most important kind of stuff.

state.text: Man, you're really sweet, Nami. You remind me of someone I knew once. She saw people for more than just the things they had too.
Agh, sorry, I didn't mean to be such a bummer. I feel like such a herb. Uh, would a giant candy bar make you feel better?

case.state: "Badass?" I---uh, really? That's not usually a word that comes up with my branding. Huh. Thanks.
Well, you're not wrong. I gotta sweat a bit to keep up with some of those demons, but I have to bring home that paper somehow.
I... um... what?
I really need to stop telling you things...
Aaaand there it is...
Yeah, I want that even less than I first thought.
I need to keep my big mouth shut...
You really just go straight for the self-confidence, don't you?
I don't know if you need religion, therapy, or both...

state.text: Wha? Really? That's a lot of red!

case.state: I didn't know anyone was in there, least of all her.
Demons are dangerous, but not as dangerous as I am!
Uh... isn't this conversation kinda, like, boring you? Wouldn't you rather talk about fluid-dynamics or spark plugs or literally anything?

state.text: You're telling me...

case.state: You think so? I do some of my best work with the ladies dressed like this.
You lost me at... "aristocrat."
Well, blessed, cursed, a bit of both usually.
I get the distinct feeling I'm not going to be able to talk you down from that...
Oh, it's nothing like that! I just want to make sure we get the facts straight for the record!
I mean, we could benefit from being attached to some of the old money in Neo Yokio, but since we're nouveau riche there's no benefit for them to try and set up that kind of alliance.
It sounds like you want to give them something to talk about.
A gentleman would never rush you into a decision. Just let me know when your misgivings melt away.
That's not an option for me, for better or worse. Notoriety has its own perks.
Oh... yeah, common side effect of me overthinking things.
Jura, I get the feeling you would like--- no, thrive in Neo Yokio.
You know, you seem like a woman who understand elegance fairly well. Neo Yokio would definitely be your kind of place.
I gotta say, I think a good mother wouldn't shove us directly into the path of danger so often.
On second thought, I'm not big on being a tourist anyway.
I'm starting to think Mejere might not be the greatest planet in the universe.
You don't have to eat it all right this moment! In fact, I would really recommend stretching it out over a few days.
It really is designed to be shared. It's surprising, but there is such a thing as too much chocolate.
